sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  name: "AccessButton",
  data() {
    return {
      dialog: false,
      tab: 0,
      tabs: [
          'Accedi', 'Registrati'
      ]
    }
  },
  methods: {
    navigateToAccessView: function() {
      if (this.$route.name != "access"){
        this.$router.push("access");
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<template>


  <v-dialog
    v-model="dialog"
    persistent
    max-width="600px"
  >
    <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
      <v-btn
        v-bind="attrs"
        v-on="on"
        v-on:click="navigateToAccessView"
        small
        depressed
        color="secondary"
        class="ml-4 px-3 py-1"
      >
        <v-icon left>
          mdi-account
        </v-icon>
        Accedi
      </v-btn>
    </template>
    <v-card>
      <v-tabs
        v-model="tab"
        background-color="primary"
        grow
      >
        <v-tabs-slider color="secondary"></v-tabs-slider>
        <v-tab
          v-for="tab in tabs"
          v-bind:key="tab"
          color="secondary"
        >
          {{ tab }}
        </v-tab>
      </v-tabs>
      <v-card-text v-show="tab==1">
        <v-container>
          <v-row>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Nome"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Cognome"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Username"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Password"
                required
                type="password"
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Conferma Password"
                required
                type="password"
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>

            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Email"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              cols="12"
              sm="6"
              md="4"
            >
              <v-text-field
                label="Numero di telefono"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="12">
              <v-text-field
                label="Indirizzo"
                required
                dense
              ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
      </v-card-text>
      <v-card-actions>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn
          color="blue darken-1"
          text
          @click="dialog = false"
        >
          Close
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn
          color="blue darken-1"
          text
          @click="dialog = false"
        >
          Save
        </v-btn>
      </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>

</template>

<style scoped>

</style>
